info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued January 27 at 3:02AM EST until January 29 at 12:00PM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY MORNING THROUGH MONDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches possible, especially for elevations above 1000 feet. * WHERE...In Massachusetts, Northern Berkshire and Southern Berkshire Counties. In New York, Schoharie, Western Albany and Western Greene Counties. * WHEN...From Sunday morning through Monday morning. * IMPACTS...Travel could be difficult due to snow covered roadways and reduced visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Valley areas may see some mixing with rainfall, reducing snow accumulation in those areas. The highest chance of moderate to heavy snowfall accumulation will be within the high terrain of the Berkshires, Helderbergs and eastern and northern Catskills.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
